import Head from 'next/head' import { useState } from 'react' import {useRouter} from 'next/router' // Styles import Style from '../../styles/layout/layout.module.css' import Navbar from './navbar.js' import Body from './body' import Sidebar from './sidebar' export default function Layout(props) { const { locale } = useRouter() const [isSidebar, setIsSidebar] = useState(false) const dropOpacity = isSidebar ? { opacity: "30%" } : {} return (
